item.title: UGC - Content Creators Needed - Review, Unboxing, Entertaining, Memes, etc. Apply Now! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Content Creators,

Caption sums it up. Looking to collaborate and make creative videos in several formats.  

Reels, Tiktok, YouTube, etc.

Please send up to 4 pieces of relevant work for us to review.

Thank you and talk soon!


Posted On: June 25, 2024 17:02 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative and dynamic Part-Time Videographer and Content Creator to join our team. - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a creative and dynamic Part-Time Videographer and Content Creator to join our team. This role involves capturing high-quality videos and photographs within our Med Spa in Frisco, Texas, creating engaging content that reflects the essence of our brand, and maintaining an active presence on our social media platforms.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 16:59 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Fashion & Beauty, Architectural Photography, People, Product Listings, Videography, Lifestyle
Skills: Business, Fashion & Beauty, Architectural Photography, People, Product Listings, Videography, Lifestyle
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
